attributes.action: Introduce measures to control fox's in surburban areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone knows the feeling, You walk out of your house one morning to find bin bags scattered across the road or your back garden! Now they may have banned the hunts in the country but the are a major problem in the suburbs, digging up lawns and `ripping open rubbish bags. These urban scavengers need to be controled.
